spells.name: Arcane Lock
spells.description: Magically locks a portal or chest.

spells.name: Obscure Object
spells.description: Masks object against scrying.

spells.name: Protection from Arrows
spells.description: Subject gains DR 10/magic against ranged attacks.

spells.name: Resist Energy
spells.description: Ignores first 10 (or more) points of damage per attack from specified energy type.

spells.name: Acid Arrow
spells.description: Ranged touch attack; 2d4 damage for 1 round + 1 round/three levels.

spells.name: Fog Cloud
spells.description: Fog obscures vision.

spells.name: Glitterdust
spells.description: Blinds creatures, outlines invisible creatures.

spells.name: Summon Monster II
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Summon Swarm
spells.description: Summons swarm of bats, rats, or spiders.

spells.name: Web
spells.description: Fills 20-ft.-radius spread with sticky spiderwebs that can grapple foes and impair movement.

spells.name: Detect Thoughts
spells.description: Allows “listening” to surface thoughts.

spells.name: Locate Object
spells.description: Senses direction toward object (specific or type).

spells.name: See Invisibility
spells.description: Reveals invisible creatures or objects.

spells.name: Daze Monster
spells.description: Living creature of 6 HD or less loses its next action.

spells.name: Hideous Laughter
spells.description: Subject loses actions for 1 round/level.

spells.name: Touch of Idiocy
spells.description: Subject takes 1d6 penalty to Int, Wis, and Cha.

spells.name: Continual Flame
spells.description: Makes a permanent, heatless light.

spells.name: Darkness
spells.description: 20-ft. radius of supernatural shadow.

spells.name: Flaming Sphere
spells.description: Rolling ball of fire deals 3d6 fire damage.

spells.name: Gust of Wind
spells.description: Blows away or knocks down smaller creatures.

spells.name: Scorching Ray
spells.description: Ranged touch attack deals 4d6 fire damage, + 1 ray/four levels (max 3).

spells.name: Shatter
spells.description: Sonic energy damages objects or crystalline creatures.

spells.name: Blur
spells.description: Attacks miss subject 20% of the time.

spells.name: Hypnotic Pattern
spells.description: Fascinates 2d4 + level HD of creatures.

spells.name: Invisibility
spells.description: Subject is invisible for 1 min./level or until it attacks.

spells.name: Magic Mouth
spells.description: Object speaks once when triggered.

spells.name: Minor Image
spells.description: As silent image, plus some sound.

spells.name: Mirror Image
spells.description: Creates decoy duplicates of you.

spells.name: Misdirection
spells.description: Misleads divinations for 1 creature or object.

spells.name: Phantom Trap
spells.description: Makes item seem trapped.

spells.name: Blindness/Deafness
spells.description: Makes subject blinded or deafened.

spells.name: Command Undead
spells.description: Undead creature obeys your commands.

spells.name: False Life
spells.description: Gain 1d10 temporary hp + 1/level (max +10).

spells.name: Ghoul Touch
spells.description: Paralyzes one subject, which exudes stench that makes those nearby sickened.

spells.name: Scare
spells.description: Frightens creatures of less than 6 HD.

spells.name: Spectral Hand
spells.description: Creates disembodied glowing hand to deliver touch attacks.

spells.name: Alter Self
spells.description: Assume form of a Small or Medium humanoid.

spells.name: Bear's Endurance
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Con for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Bull's Strength
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Str for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Cat's Grace
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Dex for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Darkvision
spells.description: See 60 ft. in total darkness.

spells.name: Eagle's Splendor
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Cha for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Fox's Cunning
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Int for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Knock
spells.description: Opens locked or magically sealed door.

spells.name: Levitate
spells.description: Subject moves up and down at your direction.

spells.name: Make Whole
spells.description: Repairs an object.

spells.name: Owl's Wisdom
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Wis for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Pyrotechnics
spells.description: Turns fire into blinding light or thick smoke.

spells.name: Rope Trick
spells.description: As many as eight creatures hide in extradimensional space.

spells.name: Spider Climb
spells.description: Grants ability to walk on walls and ceilings.

spells.name: Whispering Wind
spells.description: Sends a short message 1 mile/level.
